references.paper_title: A reduction of imitation learning and structured prediction to no-regret online learning
references.reason: This paper is foundational in establishing the reduction of imitation learning to online learning, a key concept explored and extended in the current work.

references.paper_title: Toward the fundamental limits of imitation learning
references.reason: This paper provides crucial lower bounds on the sample complexity of imitation learning, which are further refined and extended in this work.
This comprehensive textbook provides the theoretical background for reinforcement learning, which forms the foundation for imitation learning.

references.paper_title: Online estimation via offline estimation: An information-theoretic framework
references.reason: This paper introduces the information-theoretic framework used in this work to analyze log-loss behavior cloning.

references.paper_title: Foundations of reinforcement learning and interactive decision making
references.reason: This work provides the learning-theoretic foundation that underpins the analysis of imitation learning in this paper.
